oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Radiogenic isotope compositions of inclusions in diamond
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Smit, Karen V.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A literature compilation of Re-Os isotopic compositions of sulphide inclusions, and Sm-Nd isotopic compositions of garnet and clinopyroxene inclusions.
